Class PlainText

java.lang.Object
me.gamercoder215.socketmc.util.render.text.Text
me.gamercoder215.socketmc.util.render.text.PlainText
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BukkitText
public class PlainText extends Text
Represents a text element with plain text.
